Title: Elgin 1923 Vintage Pocket Watch 7 Jewels Model 3 Size 12s Running Silver Toned
Description: Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge About Us | FAQ | Customer Feedback | Policies Home Women's Jewelry Men's Jewelry Engagement Rings Organizational SALE Search Store Elgin 1923 Pocket Watch Maker: Elgin Jewels: 7 Running Condition: Running Sets: Stem Monogrammed: No Year: 1923 Model: 3 Grade: 303 Weight: 56.7 grams Size: 12s Measurements: 2 1/8" total height from the base to the top of the extended bail, 1 31/32" (44.9mm) in diameter and 7/16" (11.4mm) thick This antique Elgin watch has golden Arabic numbers printed on a champagne face with Elgin written above the center of the dial and beautiful blue hands. There is a sunk seconds register at the base with Arabic numbers. The crystal face is in good condition with some light surface wear, as can be expected on any piece of this age. The inside of the back case is stamped Illinois Watch Case Co, Spartan, 0950619. The movement is stamped 26015389 Elgin Nat'l Watch Co, USA. The back case screws securely shut. The silver toned case features gorgeous scrollwork detailing, and the back center features an engravable crest perfect for your personalized monogram! This piece is running well and keeping time on my bench, but is not guaranteed. For additional information on this piece, visit this website: Pocket Watch Database We are not watch experts and this has not been serviced. We do not guarantee these watches, but do our best to photograph them and describe them properly. We are happy to be of assistance any way that we may. This watch is silver toned. This piece has not been professionally cleaned in order to maintain its original vintage integrity. Please check out the enlarged pictures. Thank you for looking and enjoy bidding!
